name: Horde Beta 0.1.0
description: You are Square Stanley, and you are driving to get some milk for your son. As you pass through Cubetown you almost hit a man and crash your car into a building. But the town resident don't want to help you, they want to eat your pixelated brains. Make you way through the weird world of Cubetown to discover the totally shocking (and not already described in this description) secret to the game. Also, you need to shoot the green tunnel things to win, and you can trow flashlights on the ground by hitting z and not any other more logical key.
